item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J K. Rowling
item.description: "I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me." -- J K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Cinderella? Snow White? What's that? An illness?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "sometimes you don't need a goal in life, you don't need to know the big picture. you just need to know what you're going to do next!" -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "Darling, when things go wrong in life, you lift your chin, put on a ravishing smile, mix yourself a little cocktail..." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "I love new clothes. If everyone could just wear new clothes everyday, I reckon depression wouldn’t exist anymore." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "The truth is, some relationships are supposed to last forever, and some are only supposed to last a few days. That’s the way life is." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "A real relationship is two-way." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "No human on God's earth is a nobody." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "Never give up on something you really want. However impossible things seem, there's always a way." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "The thing with giving up is you never know. You never know whether you could have done the job. And I'm sick of not knowing about my life." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "Some things are best left a blur. Births and Visa Bills." -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "You don't need to change one hair. One freckle. One little toe. And if its me thats made you feel you should do this..then there's something wrong with me. -Luke Brandon" -- Sophie Kinsella

item.title: Melinda add a quote by Sophie Kinsella
item.description: "Women need chocolate. It's a scientific fact." -- Sophie Kinsella
